attributes.title: Do not download!💀
attributes.review: This app took me a full day to download, spammed my phone with calls about voting for Trump. Then began to spam me email with things about Trump 2020. Would not let me use any other apps, but once i deleted it i was allowed to use my apps. In all a very terrible app, do not recommend.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This took literally 12 hours and 15 minutes to load. So mad because of it. I don’t understand how the president can try banning an app that kids use for freedom of speech in little time but can’t get his app to work. Shoddy work if you ask me. Very disappointed.

attributes.title: T R A S H app
attributes.review: i can’t believe this- i download the app (which takes HOURS, mind you) & then once it did download????? my phone was acting so slow and it shut off. and when i got it back on- i got a call from someone spouting off racism and hate?! this is disgusting!!!!! the is the worst app there is

attributes.title: Literal garbage 🤢
attributes.review: It’s such a bad app... My sister downloaded it and upon looking at it, she ended up in the hospital. That’s quite embarrassing. This application needs to be gone. Thank you 🥰 You can’t take away our app Sir Trump. Poorly made. Causes viruses. Disgusting. There’s better apps, like tiktok. I think this should be deleted.

attributes.title: Who designed this???
attributes.review: This app has the worst UI I have ever seen. I couldn’t find anything I was looking for on here and everything I did find was a straight up lie, “fake news” if you will. Whoever green lit this clearly did not actually look at it first or has no idea what they are doing.

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app today and I was quickly prompted by a screen that told me to “go back to where I came from”. I’m an American. I was born here! Another box called me Mexican-I’m Puerto Rican! So shocked by the customer service from this app which told me I needed to attend conversion therapy. 10/10 DONT recommend

attributes.title: Do not download! 😫
attributes.review: It took forever to download and once it did, my phone started going really slow. I’m worried it put a virus in my phone. I wasn’t even able to access information on the app because it took forever to launch

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app took several days to install and when it did it did not even decide to open without crashing also when it did finally finish downloading a day later it deleted it self this app is the worst

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: This app was downloaded for me because on first thought, people told me that trump was gonna do some bad stuff and I heard about this app so I said “oh well” and then downloaded it and right when I downloaded I knew from the start it was going to be trash, p.s I came here from twitter

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible
attributes.review: This app was not easy to use and took forever to update.  I really disliked the design of the background images and the navigation menu. Overall, there was way too much sexism, racism, masochism, fascism, and hatred within this app. I will be deleting the app soon and I refuse to vote for Trump.
